body_html:
I will try to use IBVERB first, if fails, it will fall back to TCP. So if USE_GLOO_IBVERBS is enabled, it should always use IBVERB and RDMA first.

Or you can use NCCL too and that will always try to use Infiniband.
body_text:
I will try to use IBVERB first, if fails, it will fall back to TCP.  So if USE_GLOO_IBVERBS is enabled, it should always use IBVERB and RDMA first.
Or you can use NCCL too and that will always try to use Infiniband.
body:
I will try to use IBVERB first, if fails, it will fall back to TCP.  So if USE_GLOO_IBVERBS is enabled, it should always use IBVERB and RDMA first.

Or you can use NCCL too and that will always try to use Infiniband.
